00055     ///////////////////////////////////
00056     // ActorBase class fuctions
00057     ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group)
00058     {
00059         this->GameWorld = World::GetWorldPointer();
00060         this->node = this->GameWorld->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createSceneNode();
00061         this->GameWorld->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00062         //this->MotionState = new internal::PhysMotionState(this->node);
00063         this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00064         this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00065         MotionState = NULL;
00066         ActorSounds = NULL;
00067         Animation = NULL;
00068         ShapeIsSaved = false;
00069         ActorType = ActorBase::Actorbase;
00070     }
00071 
00072     ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00073     {
00074         delete MotionState;
00075         if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00076         {
00077             delete Shape;
00078         }
00079         delete node;
00080         delete entity;
00081         if(CollisionObject)
00082         {
00083             delete CollisionObject;
00084         }
00085     }

00087     ///////////////////////////////////
00088     // ActorBase Private misc functions
00089     btTriangleMesh* ActorBase::CreateTrimesh() const
00090     {
00091         // Get the mesh from the entity
00092         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00093 
00094         // Get the submesh and associated data
00095         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00096         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00097         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00098 
00099         // Get the position element
00100         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00101 
00102         // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00103         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00104 
00105         // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00106         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00107 
00108         // Get the number of triangles
00109         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00110 
00111         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00112         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00113         unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00114 
00115         // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00116         unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00117         float* pReal = NULL;
00118         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00119         {
00120             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00121             Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00122             vertices[j] = pt;
00123         }
00124         vBuffer->unlock();
00125         size_t index_offset = 0;
00126         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00127 
00128         // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00129         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00130         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00131 
00132         if (use32bitindexes)
00133         {
00134             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00135             {
00136                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00137             }
00138         }
00139         else
00140         {
00141             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00142             {
00143                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00144             }
00145         }
00146         iBuffer->unlock();
00147 
00148         // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00149 
00150         // The Bullet triangle mesh
00151         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00152 
00153         // Setup the tri mesh
00154         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00155         int i=0;
00156 
00157         // For every triangle
00158         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00159         {
00160             // Set each vertex
00161             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00162             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00163             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00164 
00165             // Add it into the trimesh
00166             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00167 
00168             // Increase index count
00169             i+=3;
00170         }
00171         delete[] vertices;
00172         delete[] indices;
00173 
00174         return trimesh;
00175     }

00177     void ActorBase::GetMeshVerticies (internal::MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00178     {
00179         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00180         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00181         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00182 
00183         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00184         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00185 
00186         TheMesh.Verticies = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00187         TheMesh.VCount = vertexData->vertexCount;
00188 
00189         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00190         float* pReal = NULL;
00191         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00192         {
00193             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00194             TheMesh.Verticies[j].x = *pReal++;
00195             TheMesh.Verticies[j].y = *pReal++;
00196             TheMesh.Verticies[j].z = *pReal++;
00197         }
00198         vBuffer->unlock();
00199     }
00200 
00201     void ActorBase::GetMeshIndicies (internal::MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00202     {
00203         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00204         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00205         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00206 
00207         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00208 
00209         TheMesh.Indicies = new int[indexData->indexCount];
00210         TheMesh.ICount = indexData->indexCount;
00211 
00212         size_t index_offset = 0;
00213         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00214 
00215         long* pLong = static_cast<long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00216         short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<short*>(pLong);
00217 
00218         if (use32bitindexes)
00219         {
00220             for (size_t k = 0; k < indexData->indexCount; ++k)
00221             {
00222                 TheMesh.Indicies[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00223             }
00224         }
00225         else
00226         {
00227             for (size_t k = 0; k < indexData->indexCount; ++k)
00228             {
00229                 TheMesh.Indicies[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00230             }
00231         }
00232         iBuffer->unlock();
00233     }

00247         float* pReal = NULL;

00249         {

00251             TheMesh.Normals[j].x = *pReal++;

00258     void ActorBase::GetMeshTextures (internal::MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00259     {
00260         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00261         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00262         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00263 
00264         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_TEXTURE_COORDINATES);
00265         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00266 
00267         TheMesh.Textures = new Ogre::Vector2[vertexData->vertexCount];
00268 
00269         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00270         float* pReal = NULL;
00271         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00272         {
00273             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00274             TheMesh.Textures[j].x = *pReal++;
00275             TheMesh.Textures[j].y = *pReal++;
00276         }
00277         vBuffer->unlock();
00278     }

00280     void ActorBase::GetOtherMeshInfo(internal::MeshInfo &TheMesh)
00281     {
00282         // Entity Name
00283         TheMesh.Name = entity->getName();
00284         // Material Name
00285         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00286         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00287         TheMesh.Material = subMesh->getMaterialName();
00288         // Material File Name
00289         Ogre::ResourcePtr Mat = ActorBase::GetOgreResourceManager()->_getResourceManager("Material")->getByName(TheMesh.Material);
00290         TheMesh.MaterialFile = Mat.getPointer()->getOrigin();
00291         // Group Name
00292         TheMesh.Group = ActorBase::GetOgreResourceManager()->findGroupContainingResource(TheMesh.MaterialFile);
00293         // Render Operation
00294         Ogre::RenderOperation Render;
00295         subMesh->_getRenderOperation(Render);
00296         TheMesh.RendOp = Render.operationType;
00297     }
00298

00343     Vector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation() const
00344     {
00345         Vector3 temp;

00425     void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00426     {
00427         Vector3 tempv;
00428         Quaternion tempq;
00429         tempv = GetBulletLocation();
00430         tempq.ExtractBulletQuaternion(CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().getRotation());
00431         this->node->setPosition(tempv.GetOgreVector3());
00432         this->node->setOrientation(tempq.GetOgreQuaternion());
00433         this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00434     }
00435 
00436     void ActorBase::DetachFromGraphics ()
00437     {
00438         this->node->detachObject(this->entity);
00439     }
00440

00442     {
00443         this->node->setScale(scaling.GetOgreVector3());
00444         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(scaling.GetBulletVector3());
00445     }

00463     void ActorBase::SetAnimation(ConstString &AnimationName, bool Loop)
00464     {
00465         if(this->IsAnimated())
00466         {
00467             Animation->setEnabled(false);
00468         }
00469         Animation = entity->getAnimationState(AnimationName);
00470         Animation->setLoop(Loop);
00471     }
00472 
00473     void ActorBase::EnableAnimation(bool Enable)
00474     {
00475         if(Animation)
00476         {
00477             Animation->setEnabled(Enable);
00478         }
00479     }
00480 
00481     bool ActorBase::IsAnimated()
00482     {
00483         if(Animation)
00484         {
00485             return Animation->getEnabled();
00486         }else{
00487             return false;
00488         }
00489     }
00490 
00491     void ActorBase::AdvanceAnimation(Real Time)
00492     {
00493         if(Animation)
00494         {
00495             Animation->addTime(Time);
00496         }
00497     }
00498 
00499     void ActorBase::RemoveSetAnimation()
00500     {
00501         if(Animation)
00502         {
00503             Animation->setEnabled(false);
00504             Animation = NULL;
00505         }
00506     }

00527 
00528     void ActorBase::EnableCollisionResponse()
00529     {
00530         switch (ActorType)
00531         {
00532             case ActorBase::Actorrigid:
00533             {
00534                 ActorRigid* Rigid = static_cast<ActorRigid*> (this);
00535                 Rigid->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00536                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() - btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00537                 Rigid->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00538                 break;
00539             }
00540             case ActorBase::Actorsoft:
00541             {
00542                 ActorSoft* Soft = static_cast<ActorSoft*> (this);
00543                 Soft->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00544                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() - btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00545                 Soft->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00546                 break;
00547             }
00548             case ActorBase::Actorterrain:
00549             {
00550                 ActorTerrain* Terrain = static_cast<ActorTerrain*> (this);
00551                 Terrain->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00552                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() - btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00553                 Terrain->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00554                 break;
00555             }
00556             case ActorBase::Actorragdoll:
00557             {
00558                 return;
00559                 break;
00560             }
00561             default:
00562                 return;
00563         }
00564     }
00565 
00566     void ActorBase::DisableCollisionResponse()
00567     {
00568         switch (ActorType)
00569         {
00570             case ActorBase::Actorrigid:
00571             {
00572                 ActorRigid* Rigid = static_cast<ActorRigid*> (this);
00573                 Rigid->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00574                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00575                 Rigid->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00576                 break;
00577             }
00578             case ActorBase::Actorsoft:
00579             {
00580                 ActorSoft* Soft = static_cast<ActorSoft*> (this);
00581                 Soft->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00582                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00583                 Soft->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00584                 break;
00585             }
00586             case ActorBase::Actorterrain:
00587             {
00588                 ActorTerrain* Terrain = static_cast<ActorTerrain*> (this);
00589                 Terrain->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00590                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00591                 Terrain->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00592                 break;
00593             }
00594             case ActorBase::Actorragdoll:
00595             {
00596                 return;
00597                 break;
00598             }
00599             default:
00600                 return;
00601         }
00602     }
00603 
00604     bool ActorBase::CheckActivation()
00605     {
00606         int Activation = this->CollisionObject->getActivationState();
00607         if( ACTIVE_TAG == Activation )
00608         {
00609             return true;
00610         }else{
00611             return false;
00612         }
00613     }
00614 }// /phys

00616 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::ActorBase& x)
00617 {
00618     stream << "[" << x.GetName() << " at:" << x.GetLocation() << "]";
00619     return stream;
00620 }
